version_description:
Bug fixes:
* Improve settings syncing
* Improve position syncing
* Reduce black screens when first joining a game

Bug fixes:
* Improve settings syncing
* Improve position syncing
* Reduce black screens when first joining a game

Bug fixes:
* Improve settings syncing
* Improve position syncing
* Reduce black screens when first joining a game

New stuff!
* Holiday 2018 hats. Only available during December!
* Disable emergency button for first 10 seconds of game.
* Add a couple missing SFX.

Bug Fixes!
* Among Us now disconnects when game loses focus.
* Issues when starting sabotage at the same time as a meeting is called.
* Players can no longer cause multiple sabotages at the same time.
* Announcement showed up when not new.
* Softlock when players call emergency at the same time they are killed
* Hats were backwards or incorrect on some kill animations.

New stuff!
* Holiday 2018 hats. Only available during December!
* Disable emergency button for first 10 seconds of game.
* Add a couple missing SFX.

Bug Fixes!
* Among Us now disconnects when game loses focus.
* Issues when starting sabotage at the same time as a meeting is called.
* Players can no longer cause multiple sabotages at the same time.
* Announcement showed up when not new.
* Softlock when players call emergency at the same time they are killed
* Hats were backwards or incorrect on some kill animations.

New stuff!
* Holiday 2018 hats. Only available during December!
* Disable emergency button for first 10 seconds of game.
* Add a couple missing SFX.

Bug Fixes!
* Among Us now disconnects when game loses focus.
* Issues when starting sabotage at the same time as a meeting is called.
* Players can no longer cause multiple sabotages at the same time.
* Announcement showed up when not new.
* Softlock when players call emergency at the same time they are killed
* Hats were backwards or incorrect on some kill animations.

* Free New Years Hat!
* Improve connection stability
* Fixed bug where players never appear to move or are invisible.
* Fixed oxygen sabotage 2/2 task
* Migrated servers and fixed numerous server-side issues. Thanks for sticking with us!

* Free New Years Hat!
* Improve connection stability

* Migrated servers and fixed numerous server-side issues. Thanks for sticking with us!

* Fixed oxygen sabotage 2/2 task
* Migrated servers and fixed numerous server-side issues. Thanks for sticking with us!

* Names and chat can include accented, Cyrillic, and Korean characters!
* Added "Find Game" filters for chat language and number of Impostors.
* Added 5 minute ban for players who leave games that have started.
* Fixed various bugs

* Names and chat can include accented, Cyrillic, and Korean characters!
* Added "Find Game" filters for chat language and number of Impostors.
* Added 5 minute ban for players who leave games that have started.
* Fixed various bugs

* Names and chat can include accented, Cyrillic, and Korean characters!
* Added "Find Game" filters for chat language and number of Impostors.
* Added 5 minute ban for players who leave games that have started.
* Fixed various bugs

* Removed 5 minute ban for ghosts that leave.
* Impostor ghosts can no longer use vents.
* Hud sabotage turns off task progress bar
* Lots of other fixes.

* Removed 5 minute ban for ghosts that leave.
* Impostor ghosts can no longer use vents.
* Hud sabotage turns off task progress bar
* Lots of other fixes.

* Removed 5 minute ban for ghosts that leave.
* Impostor ghosts can no longer use vents.
* Hud sabotage turns off task progress bar
* Lots of other fixes.

* Skins! Some hats now have skins. If you already owned a hat, you own have the matching skin for free!
* Removed 5 minute ban for ghosts that leave.
* Impostor ghosts can no longer use vents.
* Hud sabotage turns off task progress bar
* Lots of other fixes.

* Skins! Some hats now have skins. If you already owned a hat, you own have the matching skin for free!
* Removed 5 minute ban for ghosts that leave.
* Impostor ghosts can no longer use vents.
* Hud sabotage turns off task progress bar
* Lots of other fixes.

* Skins! Some hats now have skins. If you already owned a hat, you own have the matching skin for free!
* Removed 5 minute ban for ghosts that leave.
* Impostor ghosts can no longer use vents.
* Hud sabotage turns off task progress bar
* Lots of other fixes.

Bug fixes!

* Voting time can be adjusted in 30 second increments
* Improve stability in local games
* Fixed Skin separates from crewmate when spawning on right side of lobby
* Fixes a way to bypass intentional leaving penalty
* Fix missing games when failing to join a game
* Fixed scrolling on find game screen

Bug fixes!

* Voting time can be adjusted in 30 second increments
* Improve stability in local games
* Fixed Skin separates from crewmate when spawning on right side of lobby
* Fixes a way to bypass intentional leaving penalty
* Fix missing games when failing to join a game
* Fixed scrolling on find game screen

* Improve stability in local games
* Fixed Skin separates from crewmate when spawning on right side of lobby
* Fixes a way to bypass intentional leaving penalty
* Fix missing games when failing to join a game
* Fixed scrolling on find game screen

* Added ghost chat all the time
* Fix iOS freeplay and local modes
* Fix chat not working if game starts while virtual keyboard is open
* Fix random arrow pointing to weapons
* Remove graphics settings for mobile
* Improve profanity filter
* Fix dead host causing voting to tally endlessly

* No move bug should be even less frequent.
* Fixed arrow shrink/disappear when close to console
* Fix oxygen sabotage task stuck at 0/2
* No longer invisible when impostor jumps into a vent as a meeting starts
* Fix sometimes not being able to open chat
* Fix impostor sometimes not being able to kill

* No move bug should be even less frequent.
* Fixed arrow shrink/disappear when close to console
* Fix oxygen sabotage task stuck at 0/2

* Fix sometimes not being able to open chat
* Fix impostor sometimes not being able to kill

* Fix sometimes not being able to open chat
* Fix impostor sometimes not being able to kill

* Fix crash after disconnect caused by app suspend
* Fix a disconnect popup open causing players to spawn outside map
* Reduced likelihood of duplicate colors, 11+/10 players, not spawning in, and several other strangely related bugs.
* Improve duplicate name detection

* Fix crash after disconnect caused by app suspend
* Fix a disconnect popup open causing players to spawn outside map
* Reduced likelihood of duplicate colors, 11+/10 players, not spawning in, and several other strangely related bugs.
* Improve duplicate name detection

* Fix a disconnect popup open causing players to spawn outside map
* Reduced likelihood of duplicate colors, 11+/10 players, not spawning in, and several other strangely related bugs.
* Improve duplicate name detection

* Disallow kicking/banning during game. It is still available in lobby.
* Impostors can no longer do medscan task.
* Add meeting auto-proceed to online games
* Fix hud issue after killing all dummies in freeplay.
* Fix sample minigame not remembering which test tube is the anomaly
* "Start reactor" remembers your progress
* "Fix wires" doesn't always start in electricity room.
* Fix various issues if entering/exiting vent when meeting starts
* Reduce likelihood of lobby ship not despawning after game starts
* Reduce likelihood of accidentally leaving game in joystick mode.
* Fix lobby not displaying max players correctly when less than 10.
* Reduce likelihood of seeing test player spawning in.
* Reduce likelihood of spawning outside of lobby.

* Polus map is available for purchase!
* Some small bug fixes.

* Fixed a critical bug causing most buttons to stop working.
* MIRA bundle now includes three skins and hats!
* Bunches of new free hats in general!
* Bug fixes.
* Translation fixes.

* Fix a frequent failure to connect.
* Fix unfinishable tasks 
* Fix door sabotage 
* Fix certain tasks unfinishable as ghost. 
* Fix various animation issues

* Add countdown before starting game
* Add game setting for cooldown between emergencies
* Fix green body in neck snap kill animation :T
* Fix width of end game victory title
* Fix missing apostrophe in o2 sabotage
* Fix miscoloring of victim's mini crewmate kill animations
* Fix impostors being able to kill before the game starts

* Improved chat filtering
* Allow alive players to vote-to-kick players during meetings.
* Add voting notifications to chat
* Fix sound not stopping in calibrator task when interrupted
* Add missing Cyrillic characters such as ё
* Show full crew when impostor disconnects
* Can no longer use oxygen room consoles from cafeteria
* Fix number of impostors setting getting stuck lower after starting a room under capacity.
* Reduce chances of closing doors pushing players out of bounds
* Reduce chance of number of impostors becoming 0.
* Fix some common crashes

* Fix some meeting consistency/voting bugs
* Fix green hands in neck snap kill animation
* Fix some in-game store bugs
* Fix mini crewmate coloring during kill animations
* Fix missing names on intro screen when impostor
* Fix intro text when impostor count is limited by play count
* Make it harder to call an emergency meeting during a sabotage
* Fix another bug allowing impostors to kill immediately as the game starts

* Improve connection quality a little.
* Impostor must wait a few seconds before killing or sabotaging when game starts.
* Improve chat censor accuracy.
* Add option to disable chat censoring for yourself. (Doesn't uncensor previous messages.)
* Fix various crashes and bugs.

* We've decided to make the 2019 New Years Party Hat free for all of 2019!
* Comms sabotage now blocks admin map and security cams.
* Added sound effect to last ten seconds of meeting voting time.
* Fixed in-game store not responding.
* Fixed two players spawning in at almost the same time causes one player to be invisible.
* Fix various bugs and crashes

* Fixed for the ehT dlekS map task indicators
* April Fools "ehT dlekS" will be annual for 24 hours only on April 1st GMT in the future.
* Players creating Skeld rooms from this version will not spawn ehT dlekS. (Because it's outside the 24 hour window)
* Players on this version joining 2020.3.29 Skeld rooms will still spawn ehT dlekS, but the Map Settings will not reflect it.

* Fixed for the ehT dlekS map task indicators
* April Fools "ehT dlekS" will be annual for 24 hours only on April 1st GMT in the future.
* Players creating Skeld rooms from this version will not spawn ehT dlekS. (Because it's outside the 24 hour window)
* Players on this version joining 2020.3.29 Skeld rooms will still spawn ehT dlekS, but the Map Settings will not reflect it.

* Fixed for the ehT dlekS map task indicators
* April Fools "ehT dlekS" will be annual for 24 hours only on April 1st GMT in the future.
* Players creating Skeld rooms from this version will not spawn ehT dlekS. (Because it's outside the 24 hour window)
* Players on this version joining 2020.3.29 Skeld rooms will still spawn ehT dlekS, but the Map Settings will not reflect it.

Misc bug fixes such as missing hats, missing shop items, and incorrect translations.

* Add Filipino and Polish Language filters
* Add option for disabling shared "Visual Task" animations.
- When disabled, Medscan, Destroy Asteroids, Shields, both Garbage tasks will animate only for the player who is performing the task.
* Add option for disabling impostor confirmation after ejecting a crewmate.
- When disabled, "Player was ejected" is always displayed and the remaining impostor count is omitted.

Add region selector to the "Online" menu screen.
- You can only create/find/join games in your current region.
- Closest region is auto-selected, but you can change the region at any time.

- New map out now - The Airship!
- Biggest map, all new tasks, improved mobility, and more areas to explore
- New account system for reporting
- Parental approval needed for underage players

- 6 brand new colors: Tan, Gray, Banana, Rose, Maroon, and Coral 
- A new kill screen meeting menu that indicates who died between rounds 
- Ability to honk horn added to The Airship :grinning: If you have the “Stabilize Steering” task, bop the horn to honk it 
- Made it more clear you can change the chat type (Free Chat VS Quick Chat) in the game settings if you are logged in 
- Various bug fixes

Our biggest update yet in version 2021.11.9 - Roles & Cosmicubes!

- 4 new Roles. Enter a whole new level of deception with the Scientist, Engineer, Guardian Angel, and Shapeshifter roles. More information in the game lobby settings!
- Brand new customization. Visor cosmetics, nameplates, plus additional hats, skins, and pets.
- Cosmicubes and unlockable cosmetics: Play the game, gather resources, and reap the rewards of your murde-- uh, tasks. Hit the $ on the title screen to check it out.
- Leveling up: The more you play, the more experience and resources you gain.
- Account linking. Log in, link, and save your progress and cosmetics using the same account.
- Achievements. Think you're an expert Crewmate or Impostor? Only one way to find out!

Check our dev log for all the info: https://www.innersloth.com/news/

Major Changes
-New feature: Friends List! Send and receive friend requests, invite people to your lobby, and see who you recently played with.
-Temporarily removed the ability to link/unlink existing accounts.
-New free item: Ghostface Cosmetics
A secret update... watch out for April Fools Day on April 1st!

Notes
-No offline/online status for friends yet
-Cosmetics are rearranged in a different order
-Child accounts will need additional permissions from their parent/guardian to access their Friends List
